roleset.name: divide, separate

role.descr: divided from, if separate from arg1

example.name: args 0 and 2
example.text: the Pentagon 's proposed split of 60-40 between domestic and foreign bases
example.note: In this example, there is something unstated that the pentagon is dividing 60-40 between domestic and foreign bases. Thus, domestic and foreign bases are arg2, not arg1.

example.name: both items divided together in arg1
example.text: Both in terms of language and national identity , there is a clear " split between north and south . "
example.note: In this example, the two entities being split from one another (what would be arg1 and arg3) are together in the 'between' phrase. This is arg1, not arg2.

example.name: standard arg1
example.text: James Soong 's candidacy has raised the specter of a party split .
